titles.title: Congratulating Thomas Jefferson High School on winning the 2006-2007 PSAL New York City A-League Girls Basketball Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 3/27/2007--Introduced. Congratulates the Thomas Jefferson High School girls basketball team on winning the 2006-2007 PSAL New York City A-League Girls Basketball Championship.
